name: maksant-agency
description: Complete lead generation pipeline - unified interface

scripts.dev:all: concurrently --names "PROSPECT,ANALYSIS,REPORT,OUTREACH,PIPELINE,UI" --prefix-colors "green,blue,white,yellow,cyan,magenta" "npm run dev:prospecting" "npm run dev:analysis" "npm run dev:reports" "npm run dev:outreach" "npm run dev:pipeline" "npm run dev:ui"
scripts.install:all: cd prospecting-engine && npm install && cd ../analysis-engine && npm install && cd ../report-engine && npm install && cd ../outreach-engine && npm install && cd ../pipeline-orchestrator && npm install && cd ../command-center-ui && npm install && cd ..
scripts.build: cd command-center-ui && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.test:debug: cd analysis-engine && cross-env DEBUG_AI_CALLS=true DEBUG_AI_SAVE_TO_FILE=true node tests/debug/test-transparent-analysis.js
scripts.test:seo-only: cd analysis-engine && cross-env ENABLE_SEO_ANALYZER=true ENABLE_CONTENT_ANALYZER=false ENABLE_DESKTOP_VISUAL_ANALYZER=false ENABLE_MOBILE_VISUAL_ANALYZER=false ENABLE_SOCIAL_ANALYZER=false ENABLE_ACCESSIBILITY_ANALYZER=false node tests/debug/test-transparent-analysis.js
scripts.test:single-page: cd analysis-engine && cross-env ENABLE_MULTI_PAGE_CRAWL=false node tests/debug/test-transparent-analysis.js

author: Maksant
